title: Legends of Eldoria: The Ember Crown
summary: A sweeping Dungeons & Dragons campaign spanning bustling cities, treacherous dungeons, ancient forests, and the lairs of terrible dragons. Players will face traps, solve puzzles, bargain with mystical beings, and decide the fate of the realm.

scenes.title: The Call to Adventure
scenes.content: The village of Brindlemark bustles with the Spring Festival, but a messenger from the capital arrives with dire news — the Ember Crown, an artifact of immense power, has been stolen. The thief fled toward the Whispering Woods.

choices.text: Set off immediately toward the woods

scenes.title: Brindlemark Marketplace
scenes.content: Merchants shout their wares: fresh bread, sturdy rope, a mysterious potion seller. You can buy gear, hear rumors, or try your luck with a shady gambler.

scenes.title: General Supplies
scenes.content: You spend some gold to pick up rations, rope, and a healing salve. The shopkeeper warns you of strange lights in the woods at night.

scenes.title: Tavern Gossip
scenes.content: At the tavern, a farmer swears he saw a hooded figure vanish into a hidden path. A bard whispers that the Ember Crown can control dragons.

scenes.title: The Whispering Woods Edge
scenes.content: Towering trees loom ahead, their branches swaying without wind. A narrow path leads deeper, but a glint of metal catches your eye off-trail.

scenes.title: Goblin Snare
scenes.content: Too late! A hidden snare yanks you upside-down. Goblins emerge, grinning. They demand your gold to set you free.

scenes.title: Goblin Ambush
scenes.content: You draw your weapon and the fight begins! After a tense battle, you free yourself and find a small pouch of coins.

scenes.title: Deep in the Whispering Woods
scenes.content: The forest darkens. Faint singing lures you toward a moonlit glade. Will you investigate or stay on course?

scenes.title: The Fae Glade
scenes.content: Fae folk dance in a ring of mushrooms. They offer you a bargain: aid them in recovering a stolen crystal, and they'll grant a boon.

scenes.title: The Stolen Crystal
scenes.content: The fae guide you to a goblin cave where the crystal is guarded by traps. You must solve a puzzle to retrieve it.

scenes.title: Fae Reward
scenes.content: The fae are delighted and grant you enchanted boots that silence your steps. They point you toward the ruins.

scenes.title: Ancient Ruins
scenes.content: Crumbling walls and overgrown statues mark this forgotten place. An entrance to the catacombs yawns darkly ahead.

scenes.title: Hidden Cache
scenes.content: Behind a fallen statue, you find a chest with gold and a strange amulet. It hums faintly with magic.

scenes.title: The Catacombs
scenes.content: Dusty halls echo with distant roars. Skeletons stir from the shadows as you pass.

scenes.title: Skeleton Battle
scenes.content: You clash with the undead, shattering bone and steel. A hidden door opens after the last falls.

scenes.title: The Dragon's Gate
scenes.content: An immense stone door carved with a dragon motif blocks your path. The amulet from earlier fits perfectly into a slot.

scenes.title: Dragon's Lair
scenes.content: The red dragon Vyrathyx coils atop a mountain of treasure, the Ember Crown gleaming on its brow. The final battle awaits.

scenes.title: Parley with Vyrathyx
scenes.content: Vyrathyx listens, amused. The dragon offers a deal: spare its life and keep the Crown safe from others, in exchange for a favor owed.

scenes.title: Final Battle
scenes.content: Steel clashes with scale, fire fills the air. At last, with a final strike, the Crown is yours.

scenes.title: Victory!
scenes.content: With the Ember Crown in hand, you are hailed as heroes across Eldoria.

scenes.title: A Fragile Peace
scenes.content: You and Vyrathyx part ways, an uneasy alliance forged. The realm is safe… for now.

handouts.title: The Ember Crown
handouts.content: An ancient artifact said to control dragons.

handouts.title: Fae Bargain
handouts.content: A pact with the fae, offering magical aid in exchange for service.

quests.title: Aid the Fae in recovering their stolen crystal
